text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo You are a partisan hack. @NYGovCuomo acted decisively to control the COVID-19 outbreak in New York. He along with the cooperation of New Yorkers from the entire state helped to bring down the numbers. Kentucky must vote @RandPaul out.
